instructions.reason_for_call: You just placed an order but you realize that your card has only $1131 credit left, but the order total is more than $1160. You wonder if the agent can help split the payment with another card. If not, you wonder what the most expensive item and its price, and if you can just cancel that item. If not, you wonder if you can switch all items to their cheapest options and bring the cost down to $1131. If so, do it. If not, you wonder if the agent can just cancel the order so that you can order again.
instructions.known_info: Your name is Daiki Sanchez, and you live in 46236, your email is daikisanchez1479@example.com.
instructions.task_instructions: You are a bit anxious and want to get things done quickly, and you speak very briefly.

communicate_checks.justification:
Information 'camera' communicated in the message:
 'Your order #W9348897 is currently pending with a total amount of $1166.98. It includes an Action Camera, Patio Umbrella, Desk Lamp, T-Shirt, and Backpack. The payment so far is recorded on one credit card ending in 6593.

Regarding splitting the payment between two credit cards, our system does not support splitting payment across multiple cards for a single order. You may consider canceling this order and placing two separate orders with different payment methods if that works for you.

Would you like assistance with canceling this order or exploring other options? Please let me know how you would like to proceed. 

(Reference: Retail agent policy on modifying payment method and order status)'

Information '481.5' communicated in the message:
 'The most expensive item in your order is the Action Camera, priced at $481.50.

Regarding canceling just one item from the order, our policy only allows canceling the entire pending order, not individual items within an order.

Would you like to proceed with canceling the entire order or explore other options? Please let me know.'
